Text:
Thank you very kindly !

Voodoo Chile and Voodoo Child (Slight Return) are two different songs, both appear on the Electric Ladyland album.

The use of the word 'chile' is a deliberate misspelling of the word "child", to mimic that Hendrix didn't pronounce the end of the word, which he also used on the song "Highway Chile".

Your torrents are awesome !
Take care,
Gonzalo
Any time and as always Gonzalo thanks for taking the time.
Holy crap...sounds like it was recorded today. In my office.  And that's on cheap speakers.  Can't wait to burn for the long drives...
